alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 1:21PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Fremont, southeastern Teller and southwestern El Paso Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 121 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Fort Carson, or 14 miles south of Colorado Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fountain and Security-Widefield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
